[[inst_hl_shi]]
==== HL.SHI

*Syntax:* hl.shi SrcD, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_shi.svg[HL.SHI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* STA/LONG

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "LONG", "agu_kind": "STA", "note": "User confirmed all stores are AGU/STA + STD", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["AGU", "STD"], "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
